_header: Saint Agnes life I me purpose
Subjects: Agnes, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Osbern Bokenam, ‘Life of St. Agnes’ — Prologue in 8-line stanzas; Life in rhyme royal

BLAru327.First Lines:
Seynt Anneys lyf I me purposeAftyr my kunnyng in ynglysh to
                    wryte…
BLAru327.Last Lines:
…And for my guardonn lady purches þou meShe aftyr
                    þis mystery in blysse to se
BLAru327.Attributed Author:
Translated into englys be a doctor of dyuyinte clepyd Osbern
                    Bokenam…Wrytyn in Cambryge by hys sonn ffrer Thomas Burgh (index, f.
                    193)
BLAru327.Attributed Title:
The prologue in to seynt agneys lyf (rubric, f. 74) The lyf of seynt Agneys
                    (index, f. 193)
